article_node.title: Amazon Brings Back the New Fire TV Stick 4K at a Clearance-Level Price for Early Labor Day Deals
article_node.summary: The Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K is currently available for $30, a 40% discount from its usual price. This device enhances existing TVs with 4K visuals, HDR10+ compatibility, and Dolby Atmos audio for an immersive viewing experience. It provides access to over 1.8 million movies and TV episodes across major streaming platforms, along with a smart AI-powered search feature and compatibility with Alexa for easy control of smart home devices.
